footer.desc: WE BUILD TRUST OVER YEARS, NOT MONTHS

hero.title: Reliable electrical solutions for ambitious projects
hero.subtitle: Since 2008 we have been helping developers, retailers and industrial partners build safe infrastructure by selecting proven components, providing engineering support and delivering on time.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.description: We make complex electrical procurement simple by combining a deep product catalog, technical expertise and a commitment to reliable deliveries. Every order is screened by our engineers, ensuring clients receive exactly what their projects require.

quality.title: Engineering accuracy
quality.description: We double-check specifications, test critical components and document every batch so that systems perform safely from day one.

support.title: Partnership mindset
support.description: Dedicated account managers stay in touch through delivery, providing documentation, installation tips and rapid replacements if supply chains shift.

speed.title: Predictable logistics
speed.description: Optimised warehouse processes and long-term supplier contracts allow us to align with clients’ construction schedules without compromising on quality.

commitment.copy: We bring together certified electricians, logistics specialists and product analysts to support projects from concept to commissioning.

milestones.title: Milestones
milestones.description: A brief journey of how Elpro grew from a local distributor into a full-cycle electrical partner.

2008.title: Founded to serve local builders
2008.description: Opened our first showroom and warehouse, focusing on reliable cabling, lighting and protection devices.

2014.title: Expanded engineering desk
2014.description: Built an in-house team to design switchboards and help customers with specification reviews.

2019.title: Regional logistics hub
2019.description: Automated stock control and launched next-day deliveries across Turkmenistan and neighbouring regions.

2023.title: Digital procurement platform
2023.description: Introduced online catalogues and tracking so clients can monitor availability and shipments in real time.

cta.title: Ready to power your next site?
cta.subtitle: Send us your bill of materials or project concept and we will assemble a precise, delivery-ready solution.

hero.title: Welcome to Elpro!
hero.paragraph1: The Elpro store is where technology turns into delight.
hero.paragraph2: Since 2011 we have been creating a space where Apple technology and the best electronics brands meet immaculate service and personal attention for every customer.
hero.paragraph3: Here you don't just buy a device—you choose style, reliability and confidence in quality. We offer original devices, accessories and electronics that inspire and make life more comfortable.

values.title: Our values
values.intro: We stay loyal to the principles that make Elpro Store a place you want to return to:
values.item1: Experience and reputation proven over the years
values.item2: Professional advice and assistance with choosing
values.item4: Delivery with care and attention to detail

services.paragraph1: Beyond sales we run a professional MacBook and iMac repair service, and our Trade-in program lets you exchange your MacBook or iMac for a new one.
services.paragraph2: The Elpro store is more than a shop—it's a place you look forward to returning to for new impressions and technology that works for you.

card.title: We're here to help
card.description: If you need advice or support, the Elpro Store team is always ready to find the perfect solution and guide you through every step of your purchase.

hero.title: Contacts
hero.subtitle: We are ready to answer your questions and help you choose the right technology.

socials.title: Social networks
socials.hint: Scan the QR code to open the profile
